content: Thick metal reciprocating saw blades (heavy-duty) Longer-lasting reciprocating saw blade for cutting 5-15 mm (3/16 - 9/16) thick metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Powerful, durable bimetal blades optimized for cutting thick metal plate, heavy pipes, metal structures etc. Increased width and thickness – the ideal blade for when you need precise, straight cuts Three lengths available – choosing the right length based on the shape of your workpiece can increase comfort and efficiency Applications Cleaner cuts through thick metal components (5-15 mm or 3/16 - 9/16) Cutting thick metal plate Cutting pipes Cutting structural steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Shank: 1/2 in universal shank Teeth per inch: 10 Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Shank | 1/2 in universal shank | Teeth per inch | 10 | Blade features | Heavy duty, Fast cut, Long life ### ITEMS- 2179711 - Recip. saw blade SP 6 10 (5) metal - Package Size 5 pc - 2179710 - Recip. saw blade SP 6 10 (50) metal - Package Size 50 pc - 2179720 - Recip. saw blade SP 9 10 (5) metal - Package Size 5 pc - 2179719 - Recip. saw blade SP 9 10 (50) metal - Package Size 50 pc - 2179726 - Recip. saw blade SP 12 10 (5) metal - Package Size 5 pc - 2179725 - Recip. saw blade SP 12 10 (50) metal - Package Size 50 pc - 3938297 - Recip Bld SP 23 10 (50) 2 for 1 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 100x Recip. saw blade SP 9 10 (50) metal
